scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and unfolding scroll effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音，欢迎回来。第32集:混沌谷·三族齐聚。

scenes.description: 六日后,韩立身影出现在混沌谷外某个小山上,与七八名人族修士和炼体士一起。

visual.composition: Six days later, Han Li appears on small hill outside Chaos Valley, with seven or eight human cultivators and body cultivators

scenes.prompt: Six days later, Han Li appears on small hill outside Chaos Valley, with seven or eight human cultivators and body cultivators.
scenes.narration: 六日后,韩立出现在混沌谷外小山上,与七八名人族修士一起。

scenes.description: 众人神情凝重望向极远处的混沌谷入口,人人沉默不语,等待大战开始。

visual.composition: Everyone looks tense toward distant Chaos Valley entrance, all silent, waiting for battle

scenes.prompt: Everyone looks tense toward distant Chaos Valley entrance, all silent, waiting for battle.
scenes.narration: 众人神情凝重望向远处谷口,人人沉默不语,等待大战开始。

scenes.description: 灰衫中年人询问孙姓老者,黄粱前辈和蓝城主是否真的今日会出现。

visual.composition: Gray-robed middle-aged man asks Sun elder if Huangliang Spirit Lord and City Lord Lan will really appear today

scenes.prompt: Gray-robed middle-aged man asks Sun elder if Huangliang Spirit Lord and City Lord Lan will really appear today.
scenes.narration: 灰衫中年人询问孙姓老者,黄粱前辈和蓝城主是否今日会出现。

scenes.description: 孙姓老者十分肯定,说亲自接到蓝城主身边之人的飞剑传书,绝不会错。

visual.composition: Sun elder very confident, says personally received flying sword message from City Lord Lan's side, absolutely correct

scenes.prompt: Sun elder very confident, says personally received flying sword message from City Lord Lan's side, absolutely correct.
scenes.narration: 孙姓老者十分肯定,说亲自接到蓝城主身边之人的飞剑传书。

scenes.description: 老者询问韩立为何愿意半途加入,韩立不动声色说化神级以上争斗不想错过。

visual.composition: Elder asks Han Li why willing to join halfway, Han Li calmly says doesn't want to miss Deity Transformation level battle

scenes.prompt: Elder asks Han Li why willing to join halfway, Han Li calmly says doesn't want to miss Deity Transformation level battle.
scenes.narration: 老者询问韩立为何愿意加入,韩立说化神级以上争斗不想错过。

scenes.description: 忽然从混沌谷一侧传来冲天长啸声,无数股妖气纷纷冒出,融合成灰白色妖雾。

visual.composition: Suddenly from one side of Chaos Valley comes long howl, countless demon qi emerge, merge into gray-white demon mist

scenes.prompt: Suddenly from one side of Chaos Valley comes long howl, countless demon qi emerge, merge into gray-white demon mist.
scenes.narration: 忽然从谷侧传来冲天长啸,无数股妖气冒出,融合成灰白色妖雾。

scenes.description: 妖雾将半天天空都罩住,云下兽吼声阵阵,腥风大作,气势惊人。

visual.composition: Demon mist covers half the sky, beast roars beneath clouds, foul wind strong, impressive momentum

scenes.prompt: Demon mist covers half the sky, beast roars beneath clouds, foul wind strong, impressive momentum.
scenes.narration: 妖雾将半天天空都罩住,云下兽吼声阵阵,腥风大作气势惊人。

scenes.description: 隐藏的人族一方人人心中惊异,妖族突然摆出强攻架势,难道来了援军。

visual.composition: Hidden human side all surprised, demon race suddenly showing strong attack posture, did reinforcements arrive

scenes.prompt: Hidden human side all surprised, demon race suddenly showing strong attack posture, did reinforcements arrive.
scenes.narration: 隐藏的人族一方人人心中惊异,妖族突然摆出强攻架势。

scenes.description: 混沌谷方向传来轰隆隆巨响,谷口方向黄土飞扬,地面和高空同时涌出大批傀儡。

visual.composition: Chaos Valley direction comes roaring sounds, valley entrance yellow dust flying, ground and sky simultaneously surge with many puppets
visual.character_pose: Puppets emerging from ground and sky

scenes.prompt: Chaos Valley direction comes roaring sounds, valley entrance yellow dust flying, ground and sky simultaneously surge with many puppets.
scenes.narration: 混沌谷方向传来巨响,谷口黄土飞扬,地面和高空涌出大批傀儡。

scenes.description: 空中全都是丈许长的绿色木鸟,地面上则六七丈高的石巨人,全部狂涌而出。

visual.composition: Sky full of green wooden birds several zhang long, ground has stone giants six or seven zhang tall, all surging out
visual.character_pose: Wooden birds in sky, stone giants on ground

scenes.prompt: Sky full of green wooden birds several zhang long, ground has stone giants six or seven zhang tall, all surging out.
scenes.narration: 空中全是丈许长的绿色木鸟,地面六七丈高的石巨人狂涌而出。

scenes.description: 木鸟傀儡栩栩如生体态轻盈,石巨人身躯粗糙面目简陋,如此多傀儡令人倒吸凉气。

visual.composition: Wooden bird puppets lifelike and graceful, stone giants rough and simple, so many puppets make people gasp

scenes.prompt: Wooden bird puppets lifelike and graceful, stone giants rough and simple, so many puppets make people gasp.
scenes.narration: 木鸟傀儡栩栩如生,石巨人粗糙简陋,如此多傀儡令人倒吸凉气。

scenes.description: 一只翠绿色木凤和一只灰白石人走出队列,木凤头顶灵光一闪浮现绿裙女子。

visual.composition: One emerald green wooden phoenix and one gray-white stone person walk from ranks, phoenix top spirit light flashes, green-dressed woman appears
visual.character_pose: Wooden phoenix, stone giant, green-dressed woman appearing

scenes.prompt: One emerald green wooden phoenix and one gray-white stone person walk from ranks, phoenix top spirit light flashes, green-dressed woman appears.
scenes.narration: 翠绿木凤和灰白石人走出队列,木凤头顶灵光一闪浮现绿裙女子。

scenes.description: 石巨人伸出大手,同样浮现一名老翁,手持白色石拐,冷冷打量对面惊人妖气。

visual.composition: Stone giant extends big hand, also appears old man, holding white stone staff, coldly examining opposite demon qi
visual.character_pose: Old man on stone giant's hand, examining

scenes.prompt: Stone giant extends big hand, also appears old man, holding white stone staff, coldly examining opposite demon qi.
scenes.narration: 石巨人伸手浮现老翁,手持白色石拐,冷冷打量对面惊人妖气。

scenes.description: 老翁开口发出钟鸣般嗡嗡话语,询问筱道友可在,出来答话,声音传遍十余里。

visual.composition: Old man opens mouth, bell-like buzzing voice, asks if Fellow Daoist Xiao present, come out to talk, voice spreads ten li

scenes.prompt: Old man opens mouth, bell-like buzzing voice, asks if Fellow Daoist Xiao present, come out to talk, voice spreads ten li.
scenes.narration: 老翁开口发出钟鸣般话语,询问筱道友可在,出来答话,声传十余里。

scenes.description: 对面灰白色妖气翻滚,一声清脆凤鸣传来,幽黑火球激射而出,化为宫装少妇。

visual.composition: Opposite gray-white demon mist rolls, clear phoenix cry comes, dark fireball shoots out, transforms into palace-dressed woman

scenes.prompt: Opposite gray-white demon mist rolls, clear phoenix cry comes, dark fireball shoots out, transforms into palace-dressed woman.
scenes.narration: 对面妖气翻滚,一声清脆凤鸣传来,幽黑火球激射化为宫装少妇。

scenes.description: 宫装少妇不客气说道,黄石公唤她出来作甚,莫非想让出混沌谷。

visual.composition: Palace-dressed woman rudely says, why did Huang Shigong call her out, does he want to give up Chaos Valley

scenes.prompt: Palace-dressed woman rudely says, why did Huang Shigong call her out, does he want to give up Chaos Valley.
scenes.narration: 宫装少妇不客气说道,黄石公唤她出来作甚,莫非想让出混沌谷。

scenes.description: 翠芒中妙龄女子说道,十余日前谁被他们杀得大败,区区化神初期如何对抗。

visual.composition: Young woman in green light says, ten days ago who was defeated by them, mere early Deity Transformation how to resist

scenes.prompt: Young woman in green light says, ten days ago who was defeated by them, mere early Deity Transformation how to resist.
scenes.narration: 翠芒中女子说道,十余日前谁被他们杀得大败,区区化神初期如何对抗。

scenes.description: 后面妖气翻滚,又有一名妖修徐徐飞出,身材瘦小肩头停着闪闪发光的飞蛾。

visual.composition: Behind demon mist rolls, another demon cultivator slowly flies out, thin figure with glowing moth on shoulder

scenes.prompt: Behind demon mist rolls, another demon cultivator slowly flies out, thin figure with glowing moth on shoulder.
scenes.narration: 后面妖气翻滚,又有一名妖修徐徐飞出,身材瘦小肩头停着飞蛾。

scenes.description: 黄石公和天樱一见少年大惊失色,黄石公失声叫道竟是寰苍奇,他怎会在这里。

visual.composition: Huang Shigong and Tian Ying see youth, shocked, Huang Shigong exclaims it's Huan Cangqi, why is he here

scenes.prompt: Huang Shigong and Tian Ying see youth, shocked, Huang Shigong exclaims it's Huan Cangqi, why is he here.
scenes.narration: 黄石公和天樱一见少年大惊失色,失声叫道竟是寰苍奇,他怎会在这里。

scenes.description: 寰姓少年平静说道,当年一战他尚未进阶炼虚已能敌二人不败,如今早已成就五行之体。

visual.composition: Huan youth calmly says, in battle years ago he wasn't Void Refinement yet but could fight them undefeated, now has achieved Five Elements body

scenes.prompt: Huan youth calmly says, in battle years ago he wasn't Void Refinement yet but could fight them undefeated, now has achieved Five Elements body.
scenes.narration: 寰姓少年平静说道,当年一战他未进阶炼虚已能敌二人,如今成就五行之体。

scenes.description: 寰姓少年忽然转首冲远处虚空大喊,黄粱道友蓝城主,你们也现身出来吧。

visual.composition: Huan youth suddenly turns head, shouts toward distant void, Fellow Daoist Huangliang, City Lord Lan, you appear too

scenes.prompt: Huan youth suddenly turns head, shouts toward distant void, Fellow Daoist Huangliang, City Lord Lan, you appear too.
scenes.narration: 寰姓少年转首冲远处虚空大喊,黄粱道友蓝城主,你们也现身出来。

scenes.description: 淡白色光霞一闪,虚空中现出巨型玉舟,通体白光濛濛,黄粱灵君等一干人族修士站立其上。

visual.composition: Pale white light flashes, giant jade boat appears in void, white light glowing, Huangliang Spirit Lord and human cultivators standing on it

scenes.prompt: Pale white light flashes, giant jade boat appears in void, white light glowing, Huangliang Spirit Lord and human cultivators standing on it.
scenes.narration: 淡白色光霞一闪,虚空中现出巨型玉舟,黄粱灵君等人族修士站立其上。

scenes.description: 蓝城主等人面带惊容,对行踪泄露大感意外,黄粱灵君目光一扫认出幻焰蛾。

visual.composition: City Lord Lan and others surprised, shocked by leaked whereabouts, Huangliang Spirit Lord glances, recognizes Phantom Flame Moth
visual.character_pose: City Lord Lan surprised, Huangliang recognizing

scenes.prompt: City Lord Lan and others surprised, shocked by leaked whereabouts, Huangliang Spirit Lord glances, recognizes Phantom Flame Moth.
scenes.narration: 蓝城主等人面带惊容,对行踪泄露大感意外,黄粱灵君认出幻焰蛾。

scenes.description: 黄粱灵君脸沉似水,说原来在落日城偷听交谈的,是你这个老鬼,寰姓少年微微一笑。

visual.composition: Huangliang Spirit Lord face darkens, says so eavesdropping in Sunset City was you old ghost, Huan youth smiles slightly
visual.environment: Between jade boat and demon mist

scenes.prompt: Huangliang Spirit Lord face darkens, says so eavesdropping in Sunset City was you old ghost, Huan youth smiles slightly.
scenes.narration: 黄粱灵君脸沉似水,说在落日城偷听的,是你这个老鬼,寰姓少年微笑。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath night, spiritual light raining from the heavens
visual.environment: Night sky, city silhouette, floating light particles

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual particles drifting down, calm mysterious atmosphere, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第33集即将开始。
